song_title: How Can You Mend a Broken Heart.1

Verse: I can think of younger days when living for my life
Was everything a man could want to do
But I was never told about the sorrows
I can still feel the breeze that rustles through the trees
And misty memories of days gone by
No one said a word about the sorrow
Chorus: And, how can you mend a broken heart?
How can you stop the rain from falling down?
How can you stop the sun from shining?
What makes the world go round?
How can you mend this broken man?
How can a loser ever win?
Please help me mend my broken heart and let me live again
And how can you mend a broken heart?
How can you stop the rain from falling down?
How can you stop the sun from shining?
What makes the world go round?
And how can you mend this broken man?
How can a loser ever win?
Please help me mend my broken heart and let me live again
Bridge: La la la la la la, la la la la
La la la la la la, la la la la
Please help me mend my broken heart and let me live again
